data_description.device: Path to your EnOcean USB dongle.

manual.description: Enter the path to your EnOcean USB dongle.

error.invalid_device_id: No valid dongle found for this path
Device ID is not a valid EnOcean ID. A valid EnOcean ID consists of four hexadecimal parts (with at most two digits) separated by colons and is usually printed on the device (e.g. '1E:F4:BA:C7').
error.invalid_sender_id: Sender ID is not a valid EnOcean ID. A valid EnOcean ID consists of four hexadecimal parts (with at most two digits) separated by colons and is usually printed on the device (e.g. '1E:F4:BA:C7'). Only the dongle's base IDs or its chip ID can be used for sending.
error.device_already_configured: An EnOcean device with this device ID is already configured. Duplicate entries are not possible.

add_device.description: To add an EnOcean device you need to specify at least its device type and its ID.

select_device_to_edit.title: Select EnOcean device for editing
select_device_to_edit.description: Select the EnOcean device whose settings you want to change.

edit_device.title: Edit EnOcean device

data.device_type_id: Manufacturer and model or EnOcean Equipment Profile (EEP)
data.name: Name

edit_device.description: You can change the EnOcean device's model or EEP, its name or the EnOcean ID which is used to send data to this device. Note that editing the model or EEP of the EnOcean device will also change the Home Assistant device and its entities.

delete_device.title: Delete EnOcean device
delete_device.description: Select an EnOcean device to delete. The corresponding Home Assistant device and all its entities will also be deleted.
